remarks: Two group elements are equal iff their quotient is the identity. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 6-Jan-2011.)
statement:
grpeqdivid.1 $e |- X = ran G $.
grpeqdivid.2 $e |- U = ( GId ` G ) $.
grpeqdivid.3 $e |- D = ( /g ` G ) $.
grpoeqdivid $p |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( A = B <-> ( A D B ) = U ) ) $.
